item.description:
中文的21天健康挑战于

Chinese 21-Day Healthy Challenges

The 21-Day Healthy Challenge, PCRM’s newest Kickstart program, will help people in China and around the world improve their health beginning August 6th - Online!

Healthy Challenge, a Chinese-language program, provides a research-based roadmap to jumpstart weight loss, boost your health, and reduce the risk of diabetes, heart disease, and other health problems.

Traditional Chinese diets are being inundated with meat and dairy products. These unhealthful foods are driving obesity and diabetes rates through the roof. But Healthy Challenge’s meat- and dairy-free versions of traditional Chinese recipes can help reverse this trend.

Healthy Challenge, offered in Chinese (both simplified and traditional), is a free program based on the 21-Day Vegan Kickstart program that has helped more than 200,000 Americans lose weight and improve their health with a low-fat, plant-based diet.

Healthy Challenge will give participants 21 daily e-mail messages that provide an all-access pass to:

Three weeks of meat- and dairy-free recipes for traditional Chinese favorites

Cooking demonstration videos

Nutrition webcasts

Tips and words of inspiration from celebrity coaches and nutrition experts including:

Gao Yuanyuan, Chinese actress

Maggie Q, actress and international spokesperson

Alicia Silverstone, New York Times best-selling author and actress

John Salley, four-time NBA champion

Dr. T. Colin Campbell, author of _The China Study_ and expert nutrition researcher from Cornell University

To sign up for the Healthy Challenge that begins August 6th online, visit 21DayHealthyChallenge.org . (The registration page is in Chinese).

Please note: This version of PCRM’s Kickstart program is only in Chinese. 
To register for the next English-language program that begins ALSO in August, visit 21DayKickstart.org.

A 4-minute “Why Vegan?” by VO is at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fKr4HZ7ukSE&feature=player_embedded
item.how_to_find_us: Have you registered online yet at 21daykickstartchina.org?

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group
